text:
It won’t be wrong to say, it’s the best time for aspiring youngsters to make their filmy career in Bollywood.
Twitter
There is space for everyone in the film industry right now. This year, we saw two gorgeous ladies making their Bollywood debut, Janhvi Kapoor’s Dhadak won hearts while Sara Ali Khan’s Kedarnath is yet to hit the theatres, but the trailer and songs of the film are been applauded.
Instagram
Another star kid who will be making her debut is actress Pooja Bedi’s daughter Aalia, this teenager will be seen showing her acting prowess in a family comedy film which features Saif Ali Khan.
Don't Miss 263 SHARES 707 SHARES 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES
Twitter
As per reports in Film fare, “ Aalia will play Saif’s teenage daughter in Jawani Janeman. Jawani Janeman is touted to be a family comedy revolving around the relationship of a 40-year-old and his daughter. The film is scheduled to go on floors in 2019.”
Well, going by her Instagram profile, Aalia is definitely a promising face. We can't wait for her to spill her magic on the big screen.
title: Pooja Bedi’s Daughter Aalia Furniturewala Will Make Her Bollywood Debut With Saif Ali Khan
description: It won’t be wrong to say that right now it’s the best time for the youngsters who are aspiring to make their filmy career in Bollywood.
